title: Update contact methods and social links in Contact section

requirements.summary: Update Contact section contact method cards and CTA to use provided email, phone, and LinkedIn URL with correct mailto/tel links.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/sections/ContactSection.tsx`, the Email contact method uses value `m.khalid.fed@gmail.com` and href `mailto:m.khalid.fed@gmail.com`.
In `frontend/src/components/sections/ContactSection.tsx`, the Phone contact method uses value `+923411876543` and href `tel:+923411876543` (digits preserved; leading `+` allowed).
In `frontend/src/components/sections/ContactSection.tsx`, the LinkedIn contact method href is `https://www.linkedin.com/in/khalid-hussain2k26/`.
The “Send a Message” CTA button in the Contact section uses `mailto:m.khalid.fed@gmail.com`.

file_operations.description: Replace placeholder contactMethods values/hrefs with the provided email, phone (tel:+923411876543), and LinkedIn URL; also update the “Send a Message” CTA anchor href to `mailto:m.khalid.fed@gmail.com`. Keep existing UI structure and avoid changes to any `frontend/src/components/ui/*` shadcn components.

acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/sections/ContactSection.tsx`, the X social link href is `https://x.com/KhalidH05169651`.
In `frontend/src/components/sections/ContactSection.tsx`, the GitHub social link href is `https://github.com/KhalidHussain-FED`.
In `frontend/src/components/sections/ContactSection.tsx`, the LinkedIn social link href is `https://www.linkedin.com/in/khalid-hussain2k26/`.

file_operations.description: Update the socialLinks array hrefs to the provided X, GitHub, and LinkedIn URLs. Preserve existing `target="_blank"` and `rel="noopener noreferrer"` attributes on the rendered anchor elements and keep the current button/icon UI unchanged.
